text:
:wave:  Hey y'all. I'm looking to do some in-depth write ups about B2C and DTC companies that are using customer feedback to shape marketing or product in some really cool ways.

Stuff like wrangling qual + quant data to build customer journey maps, drive content strategy, improve onboarding/time to value, identify new opportunities, refine positioning...

Anyone sitting on a team that's doing stuff like this? If so, I'd _love_ to nerd out about customer feedback with you and show your company some love. DMs open :blush:
